title: Scriptorium
description: Your personal research space. Collect documents from the archive into worksets for analysis and note-taking.
noWorksets: You don't have any worksets yet. Create one to get started!
noDocuments: This workset is empty. Add a document to begin.
selectDocument: Select a document from the list to read and analyze.
startTyping: Start typing to search for documents.

overview.title: Workset Overview
overview.description: Get an AI-generated thematic summary of all documents in this workset.

suggestions.title: AI Suggestions
suggestions.description: Discover related documents from the archive that might be relevant to your workset.
